name: Click to Edit
author: Jared Novack + Upstatement

sections.description: ClickToEdit will make your site ‘live’ to authors so they can edit titles and body copy. Additional functions mean you can make any piece of content: title, body or custom field, instantly editable. Great for tweaking copy or fixing errors on the fly.
sections.installation:
1. Download the latest version.
  2. Extract it in the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. In Settings->ClickToEdit decide if you want to take advantage of automatic editing or if you prefer to put the calls in manually.
